item.description:
The Official NHC COED Softball Team will be holding team tryouts/practice on Thursday, March 29, 2007, at 5pm at Memorial Field in East Haven.

If you are interested in trying out for the team, please attend.

If anyone has extra softballs please bring them.

Memorial fields in located at the intersection of Dodge avenue and Roma street, in East Haven.

Click for Mapquest

I understand 5pm is early for some, but please try to attend even if it is aftyer 5pm. We should be there until dusk.

If players are interested but cannot attend, or have questions, please feel free to email myself or call me at 203-305-5282.

Thanks you,

Doug L
Team Organizer
item.name: NHC COED SOFTBALL TEAM TRYOUTS/PRACTICE
